GIVE NOW








 








Support Learn by Doing




Give Now










Give to what you love most at Cal Poly. With every gift made, it is you who decides how it will be put to use. Whether it's supporting a specific college or department, faculty-student research, Student Affairs, student scholarship or your favorite Mustang Athletics team, your gift can be directed to any area of campus that matters most to you. Please consider making a gift today and help shape the future of Learn by Doing at Cal Poly for generations to come. 





Support Student and Campus Crowdfunding Projects





 










Cal Poly Crowdfunding
View and support a variety of ambitious student-led organizations, projects, and initiatives on Cal Poly's campus.
View and Support Cal Poly Crowdfunding Projects



 










Kennedy Library Transformation
Support the renovation of Kennedy Library to build more inclusive and collaborative spaces for the Cal Poly community and beyond!
Learn More about the Kennedy Library Transformation



 










club Sports
Assist in providing our club sports teams with everything they need to ride high during their seasons.
Support Club Sports













Meet Zack Smith
Zack Smith is Cal Poly’s vice president for University Development and Alumni Engagement and CEO of the Cal Poly Foundation.
Learn More About Zack 



















Alumni Impact
Our alumni can be found everywhere in the world making a difference, giving back, and having an impact on their communities. Learn how you can get involved through the Cal Poly Alumni Association, and consider making a gift to your alma mater today.
Get InvolvedGive BackAlumni Events



















Parent and Family Giving
Through Parent and Family Giving, Cal Poly Parents create opportunities for outstanding hands-on education, directly enhancing the student experience and helping Cal Poly provide unparalleled Learn by Doing.
Learn More About Parent and Family Giving



















Planned Giving
When you include Cal Poly in your estate plan, you help ensure that our distinctive, hands-on educational experience will be available to students for generations to come. Learn more or get started today.
Learn more about Planned Giving



















Give to a Scholarship
By establishing or supporting a scholarship, you have the chance to affect transformational change in the life of a student, and sometimes, the trajectory of entire families — for generations to come.
Support a Scholarship


















Giving Stories



















College of Architecture and Environmental Design


Cal Poly Alum Gives Back To Program That Energized His Career

 
Ronald Allen recently decided to fund a scholarship for students in the City and Regional Planning department to “pay it forward.”



















College of Liberal Arts


Once a Journalist, Always a Journalist

 
This dedicated group of Cal Poly journalism alumni share a passion for supporting Cal Poly and ensuring the future of quality journalism.



















College of Science and Mathematics


CSM Ambassadors Help Teens Experience Marine Science Through Outreach

 
The Santa Rosa Creek Foundation supports student scholarships, field trips, Learn by Doing Labs and summer camps for Tulare County high school students.



















Center for Innovation and Entrepreneurship


Entrepreneurship For All

 
A Fresno High School and the CIE Are Increasing Educational Access for Low-Income Students
